pages.title: Behavior
pages.text: They are invisible, mischievous entities that can be quite dangerous. They seek chaos and will open doors, throw objects, open chests, and even attack players.

pages.title: Unique properties
pages.description: Using a $(item)Brew of Revealing$() reveals their true form.$(p)If a player summons a Poltergeist, they can spray a bit of $(item)Graveyard Dust$() over them to greatly increase their health.
pages._comment: Unlocked when player uses Brew of Revealing on a Poltergeist (TODO)
